title: Missa Luba; Muungano National Choir, Kenya
brief_description: Filmed entirely on location in Kenya, this is a mass in Congolese (Zairean) style, for mixed chorus with soloist and percussion. In this performance, the tenor solo is sung by three tenor voices. The video incorporates scenes of Kenya, and recorded visits to some of the choir members’ home villages. The choir is conducted by Boniface Mganga.
